I rang Steve and he was able to come round that evening (1.5 hours notice) Steve was extremely helpful and polite and gave us full confidence that he would be able to help restore the boiler function. The job was completed quickly and efficiently with tips on how to avoid a future problem. We would definitely recommend Steve and would happily use him again in the future.

Alongside that they ensured that they made good as much as possible e.G re-laid the carpet as they had to take floor boards up, ensured that no air pockets in central heating etc. Even came back quickly the following day when we identified a minor problem with air trapped in bathroom pipe. Recommended if you are looking for a professional plumber.

title: New Boiler fitted.
text: Steve diagnosed the problem with my old boiler. We discussed the options and he recommended I contact the manufacturer of my old boiler to see if it was possible to repair it. The manufacturer did not give me any hope that it would be possible to economically repair the old boiler, so I followed Steve's recommendation to replace it. Steve responded quickly to get the work done during the cold weather. The new boiler is much better. An excellent job.

title: Power flush to central heating system.
text: Steve and Harvey arrived promptly to Power Flush the Central Heating System, which hadn't been cleaned for over 25 years! Copious amounts of black sludge poured out of the system for several hours and was replaced with clean water, special additives were also added to clean the system. When the Central Heating was switched back on, it immediately began operating much more efficiently! My husband and I found when Steve and Harvey had finished, the whole house was left clean and tidy! Many thanks and well done to both, I shall definitely be contacting Steve in the future for any work needed.

text: This is not a true reflection of the job. I was at the address for three hours and only charged two. He knew this and didn’t consider my safety, it is not the correct way of uninstalling a dishwasher. The dishwasher unit was Incorrectly installed in the first place which he knew. He was helping all the way, which was useful, but this was his way of removing the unit quicker to save money! This review is totally fabricated and contradicts the card he had written out praising my work. He paid immediately and said he was happy, if he wasn’t he should have let us know and given us the chance to rectify any issues he may have felt he had. text: Steve was able to attend quickly to our call and took no time at all in locating and fixing the problem.

title: Trace and repair electrical fault on boiler.
text: Having tried to get in touch with various other engineers for over a week - none of which bothered to return my calls, I finally tried Steve. He answered the phone immediately and told me he could attend the same day! He arrived punctually and resolved a boiler problem at my mothers property that same afternoon! He was totally clear about the price for his attendance and the price for repair work was advised and agreed before he started work. His communication, attitude and helpfulness was totally professional throughout. He will be top of my contact list in the future. Highly recommended.

text: I would recommend this company.

title: Gas central heating boiler repair.
text: Steve Morgan did a great job - he's polite professional and cares about his work. There are a lot of plumbers around the Horsham area but I will stick with 1st Call Repair. Thank you Steve.

title: Call out for boiler breakdown
text: Called out Steve to look at faulty boiler. I explained that it was leaking water and had tripped the switch in the consumer unit. Steve said that he would visit within the next couple of hours and would not charge a call out fee but would charge a working charge to cover the time it will take him to find the fault. Steve took the front of the boiler off took one look at it and told me I needed a new one and then still charged me the working charge. Very disappointed!!! He did spend a few minutes to quote for new boiler but quotes tend to be completed free.

title: Repair toilet flush.
text: Efficient service, happy to recommend.

title: Fixed boiler.
text: Our boiler broke and we called several companies who were very unhelpful, not being able to help for weeks. Spoke to Steve and he came on the same day and fixed the boiler the following day. He was brilliant and honest. Would recommend him to anyone.

title: Repair to boiler.
text: This was a complicated task due to considerable building works going on around the house. Steve was up front from the start with regards costs and even though it ended up taking a lot longer than he had initially expected as it involved replacing more than one faulty component he did not charge us for the extra time. I would thoroughly recommend him and would certainly use him again.

title: New boiler and a new radiator fitted.
text: Steve was very professional, courteous and friendly. Took the trouble to explain what type of boiler was needed and why. Time keeping and tidiness was excellent. No hidden costs. Have no hesitation in recommending him.

title: Boiler repair.
text: I had a leak from my boiler outside Steve came round the same day and fixed the leak. He then returned to service my boiler and discovered my flue needed replacing. He ordered the part and returned the same week to fit it. Quick prompt service and kept me informed throughout the procedure.

title: 2 parts on the combi boiler needed replacing.
text: Steve was very polite and gave good explanations of what he had done or needed to do. He was on time or phoned to say he would be a little lait.

title: Boiler replacement.
text: Excellent response to call. Excellent non social working, hours willingness. Excellent quality work.

title: Replaced boiler.
text: Great job done! Steve replaced our old boiler, did it thoroughly and kept it all tidy. He was also mindful of the fact that we have small children in the house. Would highly recommend him.

title: Annual boiler service.
text: Have used Steve's services before and as usual he was thorough, courteous and professional. Highly recommended.

title: Boiler service.
text: Steve completed a service on a boiler that he'd originally installed. As well as completing the standard emissions and operational checks he reviewed and cleaned a magnetic filter that we have installed. He also helped to review and provide feedback against a quotation we'd received for a replacement boiler in another property that we own; this was really helpful and outside of the remit of the work that we'd called on him to complete.

title: Boiler failure.
text: Steve was very reliable and courteous. Came on the day he said he would and fixed the problem quickly. I highly recommend him.

title: TPR replaced on megaflo and annual boiler service.
text: Steve was knowledgeable, professional and reliable. I would strongly recommend him.

title: Located a leak under a tiled bathroom floor.
text: Highly recommended. Turned up exactly when he said he would. Kept working until the job was complete (23.45). Very satisfied customer. Would definitely use again (but hope I don't have to!).

title: New Worcester boiler with pipework.
text: In the pursuit of excellence this young man is a rarity. Nothing is too much trouble to leave everything in order. Courteous and hardworking.

title: Boiler repair and service.
text: Woke up to the boiler not firing up last Saturday. Gave Steve a ring, as we'd used him before and been impressed with his work. He was able to come round that morning, asses the problem, source parts and fix (including servicing the boiler) before lunch! We have always found Steve to be very reliable, helpful and focused on doing a good job in a customer focused manner. Would thoroughly recommend.

title: Disconnect and remove gas hob. Refit and reconnect after kitchen refurbishment.
text: Every aspect of the work was carried out efficiently and professionally. Steve was always courteous and took time to explain what was happening and give advice as required. I would not hesitate to use this company again in the future.

title: Repair boiler.
text: Very happy with the work Steve did. He also checked that the heating was fully functional and safe before he left and also provided advice.

title: Supply two motorised valves, adjust pipework, replace fan, rewire and service boiler.
text: Steve very quickly came to a diagnosis of the problem and once the job was started worked extremely efficiently to completion without cutting any corners or taking short cuts. Was polite and cheerful throughout and the finished result was of a good quality standard. I would have no hesitation in recommending his services to others!

title: Called to check failed central heating.
text: Steve quickly identified the problem and replaced the faulty valve. He was very courteous and helpful. Made sure everything was working perfectly before he left. I have since had to call him for an unrelated repair and received the same excellent service. Will definitely use him again. Have no hesitation recommending him.

title: Replaced boiler gas valve.
text: Steve was very willing to work on my 25 year old boiler. He showed an excellent level of competence and was able to carry out the work in a timely fashion. I had obtained the obsolete part for him to fit. He carefully examined the item before fitting to ensure its worthiness for purpose.

title: Call out to inspect failed boiler.
text: Steve was very good! I came home to find boiler was broken, called Steve out to look to check. Turns out boiler was still in guarantee and Steve went above and beyond to get it sorted. Got the company to fix it but Steve could have just tried to take the job on himself. If I need anything else I am sure to use him again.

title: Power flushing.
text: Very conscientious and passionate about his work. Provides explanation as to what the issue is and how the work required reflects on cost. Ensures that work carried out is complete and well done even if it means coming back to make add' l adjustments. Great work. Would not hesitate to use Steve again.

title: Toilet cistern and overflow repair
text: I contacted Steve just before 5pm and he was at the property within 90 minutes as he had promised. The toilet was fixed very quickly and everything back to normal. Very courteous and prompt service will definitely use again.

title: Boiler repair and replacement fan.
text: Really efficient, came out on a bank holiday Monday to assess the situation, knew what was wrong immediately and returned central heating and hot water to me 2 days later! Very pleased with the service over bank holiday weekend (especially as British gas would take 7 days and power didn't come out at all!) thank you!

title: Central heating boiler locked out, locate cause and rectify if possible.
text: Boiler locked out Sunday morning. I started to contact heating engineers to try and arrange for the necessary work. Despite being Sunday, Steve Morgan agreed to visit later that day, after he had dealt with some other work already in hand. He arrived around 5 pm, as agreed and checked the various components of the boiler and central heating system. Almost immediately he decided that the problem was not sludge and examined various components, identifying the pump as the likely cause. By then, the previously agreed time and quoted cost had been reached, but Steve was determined to carry on and dismantle the pump, to confirm his diagnosis and attempt to restore the boiler to working condition. Having dismantled the pump, he did find that it was seized and managed to free it by lubricating the spindle. Having reinstalled the pump and restarted the boiler, all went well and the system is still running smoothly the following day. In identifying and rectifying the fault, Steve spent approximately twice the time originally allocated, without any additional charge. "Above and beyond" indeed. Thorough Steve remained professional and cheerful and was obviously determined to do his best rectify the problem and leave us with a fully functioning boiler and system. I have no hesitation in recommending Steve would be only to happy to re-employ him if the need arose.

title: Replaced leaking pipe, services gas appliances, advised on thermostat settings.
text: Pleasant attitude, very helpful, got the job done. Phoned to follow up that all was OK.

title: Replace central heating pump and get the system running.
text: Steve came at very short notice to replace the central heating pump which was situated in a very difficult position under the floor boards. The job took longer than expected but the job was willingly completed.

title: Diagnosis of boiler mate thermal store problem.
text: I called Steve late one evening after our boiler stopped working. Steve traced the problem to a faulty pump and circuit board. The parts were ordered and repairs made. I found Steve to be very knowledgeable about the thermal store which is a bit of a specialist area as these units are not very common.

title: Clear blocked soil pipe ( 50 meters).
text: Work done expertly and efficiently. Drains now in perfect order. Really pleased to have contacted this company. Previously I had an astronomical "estimate" for this work so I was pleased to have called in 1st call! Very satisfied customer! Will recommend 1st Call Repair Ltd to friends and family.

title: Gas leak, faulty fan and gas valve.
text: We moved into our new home last week with much excitement but found the boiler faulty. Bad luck! I called Steve Morgan of first call for having a look at our boiler. The temperature was around minus 1 degree centigrade. He is excellent in what he does, very focused, professional, dedicated, polite and considerate. He had to put extra effort than it was initially anticipated. We will be giving him a call to change our 20yr old boiler as soon as the winter finishes. It wouldn't be fair if I had not given him this feedback. Another important point is, safety comes first in his agenda. I am really grateful to him for the checks he had done on our boiler and shut it down when he found the gas leak. Thanks Steve.

text: We called Steve out because water was gushing from the loft. Steve came out promptly and solved the problem. We later got him to replace the water tank. We were very happy with the service and found him to be very efficient, reliable and articulate when explaining the problem to us.
